name: Cotton Silk Suit
spec: This product is a women's kurti, designed in a white color with elegant embellishments. The kurti features delicate, small dotted embroidery throughout the fabric, providing subtle texture and visual interest. There is intricate floral embroidery near the neckline and the lower part of the kurti, adding a touch of sophistication and detail. The neckline is round-shaped and showcases vertically-aligned embroidered motifs. Both the sleeve cuffs and the hemline of the kurti are finished with white lace borders, enhancing its overall feminine and premium appearance. The adjacent piece of fabric in the image appears to be a matching dupatta or a part of the suit set, made from a light, striped material that complements the kurti. This style is ideal for elegant, semi-formal occasions or festive wear, emphasizing refined sophistication and classic beauty.

name: Vatican Silk Suit
spec:
This product is ready to wear three-piece kurti suit material set designed for women. The set features a soft olive green color with subtle beadwork and small embroidered patterns on the kurti fabric. The material includes:
* A kurti (top) fabric with intricate bead and sequin handwork running vertically along the center and border accents on the sleeve ends.
* A matching plain bottom fabric in a similar olive green shade.
* A coordinating dupatta (scarf) with an embellished border that complements the kurti's design.

name: Romeo
spec:
Romeo by Liore Parfum is a captivating Aromatic Fougère fragrance crafted for the modern, confident man.
It opens with a refreshing burst of lavender and mandarin orange, balanced by the smooth sweetness of black currant and the crisp, green touch of petitgrain.

Key Notes

Top Notes:
• Lavender
• Mandarin Orange
• Black Currant
• Petitgrain

Heart Notes:
• Lavender
• Orange Blossom
• Jasmine

Base Notes:
• Madagascar Vanilla
• Musk
• Cedar
• Ambergris

These layers blend seamlessly to create a sophisticated and addictive scent profile — fresh at the start, elegant at the heart, and warm, sensual, and long-lasting in the dry down.

Romeo is designed for men who want a fragrance that is both refreshing and deeply masculine, making it perfect as a daily signature scent or an evening standout.

Projection: 12 - 15 Hours

name: Juliet
spec:
Juliet by Liore Parfum is an enchanting Oriental Fougère fragrance crafted for women who love a blend of sweetness, warmth, and confidence. It opens with a uniquely comforting mix of chestnut and sugar, creating a deliciously cozy first impression. At the heart, aromatic sage and soft lavender add depth and elegance, bringing a refined, feminine balance to the sweetness.

Key Notes:
• Top Notes: Chestnut, Sugar
• Heart Notes: Sage, Lavender
• Base Notes: Vanilla, Smoke

As it settles, Juliet reveals a smooth, sensual base of creamy vanilla and soft smoky nuances, leaving a warm, irresistible trail that feels both comforting and captivating.

Bold, sweet, and sophisticated — Juliet is the perfect signature scent for women who want their fragrance to be unforgettable.

Projection: 12 - 15 Hours

name: Aswad
spec:
🍋 Fruity Aromatic Fresh

A vibrant Fruity Aromatic fragrance that balances freshness, depth, and modern masculinity.
It opens with a lively burst of lemon and lavender, combining zesty brightness with aromatic calm for an instantly refreshing start.
The heart introduces cool sea notes blended with earthy nagarmotha, creating a unique contrast of marine freshness and smoky depth.
As it dries down, the fragrance settles into a warm, grounding base of amber and patchouli, leaving a smooth, sensual, and long-lasting trail.
Perfect for daytime wear, casual outings, and anyone who enjoys fresh scents with a hint of earthy sophistication.

Key Notes

Top Notes:
• Lemon
• Lavender

Heart Notes:
• Sea Notes
• Nagarmotha

Base Notes:
• Amber
• Patchouli

Inspired Version Of: Black XS by Paco Rabanne

Projection: 7 - 8 Hours

name: Baby Panther
spec:
A soft and enchanting Powdery Floral fragrance that blends sweetness, elegance, and timeless femininity. It opens with a delicate mix of dried fruits and strawberry, adding a gentle fruity sweetness that feels warm, comforting, and inviting.

The heart blossoms into a rich bouquet of gardenia, ylang-ylang, and rose, creating a creamy floral harmony that is both graceful and captivating. As it settles, the scent drapes the skin in a velvety base of oakmoss, musk, and patchouli, adding depth, softness, and a powdery sophistication that lingers beautifully.

Perfect for lovers of warm florals with a vintage, powdery charm.

Key Notes:
Top Notes:
• Dried Fruits
• Strawberry

Heart Notes:
• Gardenia
• Ylang-Ylang
• Rose

Base Notes:
• Oakmoss
• Musk
• Patchouli

Projection: 7 - 8 Hours

name: Elaf
spec:
🌺 Floral Fruity Glow

A sweet and radiant Floral Fruity fragrance that blends playful freshness with soft, creamy warmth.
It opens with the juicy brightness of raspberry, offering a vibrant fruity sparkle that instantly uplifts the senses.
At the heart, a lush floral bouquet of jasmine, tuberose, and orange blossom blooms beautifully, adding depth, sensuality, and feminine elegance.
As it settles, the fragrance becomes smooth and comforting with notes of milk and soft musk, creating a gentle, skin-like warmth that lingers delicately throughout the day.
Perfect for those who love sweet florals with a creamy, modern twist.

Key Notes

Top Notes:
• Raspberry

Heart Notes:
• Jasmine
• Tuberose
• Orange Blossom

Base Notes:
• Milk
• Musk

Inspired Version Of: So Scandal by Jean Paul Guiltier

Projection: 7 - 8 Hours

name: Fusion
spec:
✨ Oriental Vanilla Elegance

A warm and sensual Oriental Vanilla fragrance that blends bright freshness with floral depth and creamy sweetness.
It opens with the sparkling zest of Italian lemon, delivering a fresh, lively brightness that instantly uplifts the senses.
At the heart, the luxurious softness of Turkish rose blooms gracefully, adding a romantic and velvety floral richness.
